name: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest
description:
Tales From Hoia Baciu is a first-person adventure game free to play.

Start an adventure

    Start an adventure in the famous HOIA BACIU forest in Romania, living paranormal and creepy local stories.
The game will contain stories inspired by real ones and fictional stories.
Made with unreal engine 5 using free assets only is still a work in progress.

Game Features:

    Story-focused exploration - Explore the dark places of the peoples that you thought they are good and reveal the dark secrets.
    Psychological Horror

Tags:

    Indie Horror Adventure Single Player
